tplinkPortMirrorMIB.name: tplinkPortMirrorMIB

revisions.description: Initial version of this MIB module.

tplinkPortMirrorMIB.description: The config of the port mirror.

tpPortMirrorSession.name: tpPortMirrorSession
tpPortMirrorSession.description: This object indicates the session number of the mirror group.

tpPortMirrorDestination.name: tpPortMirrorDestination
tpPortMirrorDestination.description: This object indicates a destination port which monitors specified ports on the switch, should be given as 1/0/1. Note: The member of LAG cannot be assigned as a destination port.

tpPortMirrorIngressSource.name: tpPortMirrorIngressSource
tpPortMirrorIngressSource.description: This object indicates a list of the source ports. Any packets received from these ports will be copyed to the assigned destination port. This should be given as 1/0/1,1/0/2-12. Note: The ports in other sessions and destination port can't add to this list.

tpPortMirrorEgressSource.name: tpPortMirrorEgressSource
tpPortMirrorEgressSource.description: This object indicates a list of the source ports. Any packets sended out from these ports will be copyed to the assigned destination ports.This should be given as 1/0/1,1/0/2-12. Note: The ports in other sessions and destination port can't add to this list.

tpPortMirrorBothSource.name: tpPortMirrorBothSource
tpPortMirrorBothSource.description: This object indicates a list of the source ports. Any packets received or sended out from these ports will be copyed to the assigned destination ports.This should be given as 1/0/1,1/0/2-12. Note: The ports in other sessions and destination port can't add to this list.

tpPortMirrorSessionState.name: tpPortMirrorSessionState
tpPortMirrorSessionState.description: This object indicates the state of mirror session.If a session has been assigned both destination port and source ports, then the value of this object changes to active(2). Otherwise the value of this object is to be negative(1). When the value of this object is assigned to clear(3), then the configuration of this session will be cleared, and the state changes to negative(1). Be aware of that only clear(3) can be assigned to this object.
